content: k2 yo k2 66 9 ssk k2 yo k2 10 sl1 k2tog psso k1 yo k2 55 11 ssk k1 yo k2 12 sl1 k2tog psso yo k2 44 13 ssk k2 33 14 ssk k1 22 15 ssk 11 pattern cut yarn leaving a tail thread the tail through the remaining 11 sts pull the hole closed and before you begin string 150 beads onto the yarn weave the tail on the inside of the hat block as you knit gently move them towards the other lightly end of the ball as needed using us 4 3 5 mm circular needle co 110 sts join into round being careful not to twist s�tches k3 p2 all the way around un�l work measures 1 2 5 cm from cast-on edge k2 sts and place marker the marker not the tail of the yarn is the beginning of all future rounds switch to us 6 4 mm needles begin using odessa s�tch pa�erns work 2 plain rnds *1 beaded round 3 plain rnds repeat from * un�l work measures 5 5 14 cm from cast-on edge for a deeper hat you may wish to work an addi�onal 1-2 begin hat decreases switch to dpns when there are too few sts to stretch around the circular needle repeat each line of instruc�ons for the en�rety of one round page 2 of 2 ©2008 www grumperina com all rights reserved
